name: RunAndRewind
description:
How TO Play : w a s d  OR arrow keys to move : Z to rewind : GoodLuck

story: you been paid for a test in a lab.The owner of the lab gave you some shot after that you quickly turned into a creture.In order to test your power you will go through some tests.But you managed to escape.and you were in a cave of some kind after collecting the golden coins you started to find your way out. what do you think will happen next? 

there is a good ending and a bad one

edit: i am sorry if the gmae control feels kinda rushed  am only 13 and  made everything my self so it was  really hard to keep up hard
